```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(stringr)
```


```{r}
kidney <- readLines("f:/GSE107585/Mouse_kidney_single_cell_datamatrix.txt", n = 3)
cells <- kidney[1] %>% str_split(pattern = "\t") %>% .[[1]] 
clusters <- kidney[2] %>% str_split(pattern = "\t") %>% .[[1]] %>% .[-1]
length(cells);length(clusters)
table(clusters) %>% sort()
```


```{r}
kidney[3] %>% str_split(pattern = "\t") %>% .[[1]] %>% length()
```

```{r}
cells <- c("geneid", cells)
clusters <- c("geneid", clusters)

kidney <- read.table("f:/GSE107585/Mouse_kidney_single_cell_datamatrix.txt", sep = "\t")
```
